data.title: Regional Festival of Armenian Spiritual Songs Held in Shirak
data.meta_description: Regional Festival of Armenian Spiritual Songs Held in Shirak
data.text:
The Festival brought together the choirs from the North-Western region, spreading the spiritual music of this region. In the run-up to the Armenian Genocide 100th anniversary the festival held in Harichavanq monastery was dedicated to the eternal memory of the innocent victims and 145th anniversary of Komitas’ birthday.

The children’s choirs of musical, arts and ordinary schools of Gyumri, Artik, Azatan, Akhuryan, Amasia, Shirak region participated.

As well as, “Saghmos” choir of the Artik Diocese of Armenian Apostolic Church.

See the video for the details.
